title: Southern Buttermilk Pie
directions: Preheat oven to 350Â°. Whisk together sugar and flour in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and the rest of the ingredients into the flour mixture; pour into your favorite unbaked pie crust.
Bake for 35 to 45 minutes or until almost set, shielding the edges with aluminum foil after 15 minutes so the crust doesn't burn. Cool on a wire rack at least an hour.
